Lv2.Title: Warranty Statement (English)
Lv2.Content:
KZG MOBILE

WARRANTY   STATEMENT

  The warranty period of KZG mobile phones is thirteen (12+1) months，battery is 6 months, charger and earphone are 3 months, starting from the purchase date according to the invoice. During the warranty period, if there is any problem because of the product’s own quality, we will provide free maintenance.

The following circumstances will not be included.
1.Normal wear and tear.
2.The damage caused by customer’s   inappropriate preservation, maintenance or the usage.
3.The breakdown and damage caused by the force majeure, such as earthquake, flood, fire…
4.If the product is opened or repaired not by KZG authorized service center.

Remark:
*If there isn’t purchase invoice, the warranty period should start from manufacturer date.
*The following circumstances have no warranty, the customers can pay in order to repair.
1. Broken screen.
2. Fall in water.
3. Problems caused by fall down.
4. Warranty paper was removed.
5. Beyond the warranty period.

THANK YOU!

Lv2.Title: Warranty Statement (KinyaRwanda)
Lv2.Content:
IBIJYANYE NA GARANTI

  KZG mobile phone itanga garanti y’umwaka nu kwezi kumwe (12+1)，bateri ihabwa garanti ya mezi atandatu(6) naho ekuteri na sharigeri bihabwa garanti y’amezi atatu (3) izo garanti zose zitangira gukoreshwa igihe waguriyeho telephone ya KZG dukurikije fagiture, mugihe cya garanti ikibazo giturutse kuri telephone, umukiriya atagizemo uruhare, tugikorera kubuntu.

Ibi bikuririkira ntago biri muri garanti ihabwa umukiriya:
1.Telefone kuba ituzuye ,urugero(idafite urugi)
2.Ikibazo cyiba giturutse kuburyo umukiriya yafashemo telephone
(kuyibika nabi,kuyifata nabi,kuyikoresha nabi)
3.Kwangirika kwa telefone guturutse kumbaraga zidasazwe
(umutingito,imyuzure,umuriro)
4.Igihe telefone bigaragarako yakozwe nabandi ba
tekinisiye batari aba KZG

ICYITONDERWA
*Iyo nta fagiture yigihe waguriyeho telephone ufite, tubara dukurikije igihe telephone yakorewe. 
*Bimwe mu bibazo bikurikira bitaba biri muri garanti,umukiriya 
yaba yakwishyura kugirango abashe gukorerwa telefone ye:
1.Ikirahure cyamenetse
2.Telefone yaguye mu mazi
3.Ibibazo byose byatewe nuko telefone yikubise hasi
4.Agapapuro ka garanti ntakari kuri telefone
5.Igihe cya garanti ya telefone cyararangiye
                               
MURAKOZE.

Lv2.Title: Warranty Statement (Swahili)
Lv2.Content:
KZG MOBILE 

MAELEZO YA WARRANTII

Warrantii ya simu za KZG ni miezi 13{12+1} betri ni miezi 6, charger na earphone ni miezi 3 inanza tarehe ya manunuzi ya simu kulingana na risiti. Katika kipindi cha warrantii, kama kutakuwa na tatizo linalosababishwa na simu yenyewe, tutatoa huduma bure.

Sababu zifuatazo hazitakuwa katika warrantii
1.michubuko au mikwaluzo yakawaida
2.matatizo yanayosababishwa na mteja kutojari au kutokuwa na matumizi mazuri.
3.matatizo yanayosababishwa na maafa kama:tetemeko la ardhi,mafuriko,moto,nk.
4.kama simu imefunguliwa au kutengenezwa nje ya KZG huduma kwa wateja

Zingatia
*kama hakuna risiti ya manunuzi warrantii itaanzia kwenye tarehe iliyotengenezwa simu.
*sababu zifuatazo hazina warrantii, mteja unatakiwa uli pie matengenezo:
1.kuvunjika au kuvunja kioo.
2.kukutwa na unyevunyevu au kuwekwa maji.
3.matatizo yanayosababishwa na kudondoka kwa simu.
4.karatasi ya warrantii kutolewa ndani ya simu.
5.baada ya warrantii kwisha muda wake.

ASANTE !
